!
! Cisco IOS BGP Configuration
!
router bgp 65000
 bgp router-id 192.168.255.1
 bgp log-neighbor-changes
 neighbor 10.0.0.2 remote-as 65001
 neighbor 10.0.0.2 description ISP Connection
 neighbor 192.168.255.2 remote-as 65000
 neighbor 192.168.255.2 description iBGP Peer
 neighbor 192.168.255.2 update-source Loopback0
 !
 address-family ipv4 unicast
  neighbor 10.0.0.2 activate
  neighbor 10.0.0.2 soft-reconfiguration inbound
  neighbor 192.168.255.2 activate
  neighbor 192.168.255.2 next-hop-self
 exit-address-family
!
ip prefix-list BOGONS seq 10 permit 10.0.0.0/8 le 32
ip prefix-list BOGONS seq 20 permit 172.16.0.0/12 le 32
ip prefix-list BOGONS seq 30 permit 192.168.0.0/16 le 32
!
route-map IMPORT-ISP permit 10
 match ip address prefix-list BOGONS
 set local-preference 50
!
route-map IMPORT-ISP permit 20
!
